comments_since_last_sample.body: I seen most of the episodes…this in my top 3 …probably the best one lol…Nore was fried hHahahHa

Wale made this episode waaaaay to hard and awkward. Is he always this unlikeable?
I don't care for Wale's personality at all. He has a real crappy, sarcastic attitude. More is always in great  spirits. Wale brought down the energy.
I got a weird vibe from this joint
Wale is great man!! I ain’t never seen Nore faded like that lmao
You can tell Wale was getting annoyed. NORE needs to make a list of questions and follow them and don’t stray off. NORE be asking anything sometimes

This was a really good interview. So much energy! Wale def knew how to handle the tough questions. Def a GOAT in this industry. I do wish they would've let him finish talking about how No Hands came about and a lot more about his album/ legendary collabs throughout his career. Not many ppl can say the had songs with many ppl he worked with.
